posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Ghost's version is sure more intriguing, here are a couple of changes i would do to this,

a) replace toughness with called shot and,
b) replace great dexterity I with epic prowess
c) start with 16 dex - 10 str to finish on the same total dex (22)

This way you will have 4 attacks (i am looking at the corrected version) and 45 AB which it can also be boosted 9/day with bard song (+2 AB). Then, if going for PvP i would also substitute EMA with Epic Warding. Pre-epic change order of the improved critical and rapid shot feats too.

One of the pro's Ghost's archer has is also the higher fortitude save if that is of any concern.
